findings.rationale: The obligation to maintain confidentiality in perpetuity may impose indefinite restrictions on parties, increasing the risk of unintentional breaches over time.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions between the parties.

findings.rationale: Indemnifying without limit can expose a party to significant financial liabilities, especially if a breach leads to substantial claims.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit.

findings.rationale: The absence of liability limitations can result in unforeseen financial exposure for either party in case of legal claims.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The automatic assignment of rights to Company A may limit the other party's ability to utilize their own contributions, creating potential disputes.
findings.evidence_quote: The receiving party hereby assigns all right, title, and interest in such work product.

findings.rationale: The provision to recover attorneys' fees may deter parties from pursuing legitimate claims due to the fear of incurring additional costs.
findings.evidence_quote: The prevailing party in any dispute shall be entitled to recover all attorneys' fees and costs from the non-prevailing party.
